sentences.sContent: In either case it is persuasive because there is somebody whom it persuades.
sentences.sContent_eng: In either case it is persuasive because there is somebody whom it persuades.
sentences.sCn: 不管在那种情况下，它之所以有说服力，是因为有人被说服了。

sentences.sContent: Providing examples of what others are saying about your suitability and skills is extremely persuasive and the more you have, the more your influence rises.
sentences.sContent_eng: Providing examples of what others are saying about your suitability and skills is extremely persuasive and the more you have, the more your influence rises.
sentences.sCn: 举例说明别人对你的适合性和技能的评价十分有说服力，这样的例子越多，你的影响力增长的就越大。

synos.tran: 有说服力的；劝诱的，劝说的

words.tran: 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事
